def_cn: 隐含讥讽的；有言外之意的
def_en: A backhanded compliment is a remark which seems to be an insult but could also be understood as a compliment. A backhanded compliment is also a remark which seems to be a compliment but could also be understood as an insult.
If you say that someone is doing something in a backhanded way, they are doing it indirectly.
